languages.text: "Эмелина, сдержи свои порывы спорить о внутренних делах в присутствии Вольного Торговца. Вдобавок... я не потерплю оскорбления Лорд-инквизитора в моем присутствии".
"Emelina, suppress your urge to debate internal matters in the presence of the Rogue Trader. Additionally... I will not tolerate insults to the Lord Inquisitor in my presence."
languages.original_text: "Эмелина, сдержи свои порывы спорить о внутренних делах в присутствии Вольного Торговца. Вдобавок... я не потерплю оскорбления Лорд-инквизитора в моем присутствии".

traits.locale_text: "Emelina, suppress your urge to debate internal matters in the presence of the Rogue Trader. Additionally... I will not tolerate insults to the Lord Inquisitor in my presence."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Emelina, suppress your urge to debate internal matters in the presence of the Rogue Trader. Additionally... I will not tolerate insults to the Lord Inquisitor in my presence."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “艾米莉娜，克制些，别在行商浪人面前讨论我们审判庭的内部事务。而且……我可不允许你在我面前侮辱大审判官。”
languages.original_text: "Emelina, suppress your urge to debate internal matters in the presence of the Rogue Trader. Additionally... I will not tolerate insults to the Lord Inquisitor in my presence."

traits.locale_text: “艾米莉娜，克制些，别在行商浪人面前讨论我们审判庭的内部事务。而且……我可不允许你在我面前侮辱审判长。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Emelina, contenga su necesidad de debatir asuntos internos en presencia de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Además... no toleraré insultos al Lord Inquisidor en mi presencia».
languages.original_text: "Emelina, suppress your urge to debate internal matters in the presence of the Rogue Trader. Additionally... I will not tolerate insults to the Lord Inquisitor in my presence."

traits.locale_text: «Emelina, contenga su necesidad de debatir asuntos internos en presencia de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Además... no toleraré insultos al Lord Inquisidor en mi presencia».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「エメリナさん、自由開拓者の前では内政について議論したいという衝動を抑えてください。それと…我の前でロード・インクィジターに対する侮辱は許しません」
languages.original_text: "Emelina, suppress your urge to debate internal matters in the presence of the Rogue Trader. Additionally... I will not tolerate insults to the Lord Inquisitor in my presence."

traits.locale_text: 「エメリナさん、自由開拓者の前では内政について議論したいという衝動を抑えてください。それと…我の前でロード・インクィジターに対する侮辱は許しません」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Emelina, abstenez-vous de débattre d'affaires internes en présence {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Par ailleurs... je ne tolérerai aucune insulte à l'encontre du seigneur inquisiteur. »
languages.original_text: "Emelina, suppress your urge to debate internal matters in the presence of the Rogue Trader. Additionally... I will not tolerate insults to the Lord Inquisitor in my presence."

traits.locale_text: « Emelina, abstenez-vous de débattre d'affaires internes en présence {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Par ailleurs... je ne tolérerai aucune insulte à l'encontre du seigneur inquisiteur. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Emelina, unterdrückt Euren Drang, interne Angelegenheiten in Anwesenheit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu besprechen. Außerdem ... dulde ich keine Beleidigungen des Großinquisitors."
languages.original_text: "Emelina, suppress your urge to debate internal matters in the presence of the Rogue Trader. Additionally... I will not tolerate insults to the Lord Inquisitor in my presence."

traits.locale_text: "Emelina, unterdrückt Euren Drang, interne Angelegenheiten in Anwesenheit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu besprechen. Außerdem ... dulde ich keine Beleidigungen des Großinquisitors."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Emelina, Hür Tacir'in karşısında içsel meselelerimizi konuşma isteğini bastırmalısın. Ayrıca benim karşımda Lord Engizisyoncu'ya hakaret etmeni tolere etmeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Emelina, suppress your urge to debate internal matters in the presence of the Rogue Trader. Additionally... I will not tolerate insults to the Lord Inquisitor in my presence."
